summary: An email from an Assistant United States Attorney to an individual named Reynolds, scheduling a meeting to prepare for trial testimony. The email attaches a trial subpoena and discusses logistics for a trial scheduled to begin on November 29, 2021.

persons.name: Reynolds
persons.context: Addressed in an email from an AUSA regarding a meeting to prepare for trial testimony and receiving a trial subpoena.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney Southern District of New York
persons.context: Author of the email, scheduling a meeting with Reynolds to prepare for trial testimony and providing a trial subpoena.

connections.person1: Assistant United States Attorney Southern District of New York
connections.description: The AUSA is preparing Reynolds to testify as a witness in an upcoming trial, as indicated by the subpoena and meeting arrangement.

events.title: Preparation meeting scheduled
events.description: A meeting is scheduled between an AUSA and Reynolds at Reynolds's office to prepare for trial testimony.
personsInvolved: Assistant United States Attorney Southern District of New York

events.title: Trial scheduled to begin
events.description: A trial is scheduled to begin on this date, with Reynolds expected to testify.

events.title: Expected testimony period
events.description: Reynolds is expected to testify sometime in early December 2021 during the trial.

locations: 1 St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: A trial subpoena was issued to compel Reynolds's testimony in a trial scheduled to begin on November 29, 2021.
The correspondence indicates active trial preparation by the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York in mid-2021.
The email outlines a timeline for witness preparation, including a meeting in July 2021 and a refresher session planned for early November 2021.
